attributes.action: put pressure on the BBC and the great City Councils to remove the Big Screens ruining our historic civic centres.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
STOP THE ROT, SAY NO TO CULTRUAL VANDALS, SUPPORT YOUR HISTORIC CITY CENTRES, SUPPORT PEACE AND QUIET! ABOVE ALL, PUT THE GROWNUPS BACK IN CHARGE OF THE STREETS.

What on earth has happened to our once proud civic centres?  Beautiful architecture and fine workmanship, (pre-dating and surviving the mad council abominations of the 1960s), accessible to all, are now dominated by Big Screens which repel anyone except, possibly, binge drinkers and out of control children. 

Birmingham's Big Screen has been passionately criticized by the Civic Society. It is an intrusive eye-sore, a noise polluter and degrades the historic civic centre. The screen makes our great public places into a kind of teenage-den  -slouchy-grungy-hang-out-bar.  Birmingham are even putting a beach around the screen this summer. 
Say no to profligate spending, say no to  cultural vandals, support your historic City and support Peace and Quiet!
attributes.creator_name: Mrs M A Westrop - also see my petition against VAT on historic building repairs

rejection.details: Please re-submit without all the CAPITALS, they make it hard for people to read, and remove the plug for your other petition. We will then re-consider it. Thank you.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
